name: Otaku Piano: Anime Manga songs
description:
Piano game for no yaiba, boku no, ghoul, sword art fan and others 1000+ anime and cartoon songs. All your love songs are here now.

Features:
1. Search your love songs
2. Unlimited Speed piano game.
3. Choose your speed you want at start level
4. All anime and cartoon songs
5. 1000+ songs and update weekly
6. Amazing sound quality - music smooth with your finger
7. Choose your favorite background
8. Play without internet connection. All songs is in your device.

Game rules:
Tap on the black tiles while listening to music. Enjoy piano music, improve your speed! Speed increase in next round and never stop.

DISCLAIMER:
This game is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by films management, or record label.
This app does not include any copyrighted material.
The piano melodies are arranged with individual piano notes
This app is for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK:
Feel free to email us song requests, issues, comments, and suggestions, with your comments, we can add more songs and make better games ever! Thank you for download game!
